candidate_process.title: For Candidate
candidate_process.notes: If you are new to GHRN
candidate_process.one: Scout system site GHRN where you can scout registered personnel
candidate_process.two: GHRN that can (come) scout from companies all over Japan
candidate_process.three: GHRN finds a variety of ways to work in Japan
candidate_process.four: A site that introduces foreigners who want to work in Japan (including those living in Japan) to Japanese companies GHRN

leftMsg.one: GHRN (GlobalHumanResourceNetwork) is for foreigners who want to work in Japan who are registered on this site or who are already living in Japan (international students or working) Is a site where you can scout the right human resources
leftMsg.two: If you find a person you are interested in, register the job search information on the site and scout. The job information will be converted into the native language of the scouting personnel and sent to the person on this site.
leftMsg.three: The registrant who receives the scout will view the job search information and decide whether to take the scout.
leftMsg.four: The registrant who receives the scout will view the job search information and decide whether to take the scout.
leftMsg.five: If a scout is received, the scout company will be notified as a match. * Here, personal information is disclosed for the first time.
leftMsg.six: Both sides that have matched will exchange information up to recruitment using the on-site chat and web interview system.
leftMsg.seven: * The web interview system uses Sokumen.

specific_skill_section.title: What is 'specific skill'?
specific_skill_section.title-description: 'Specific Skills' is a new status of residence newly established in April 2019. Even if efforts are made to improve productivity and secure domestic human resources, it is limited to 14 fields (specific industrial fields) where it is difficult to secure human resources. Acceptance was accepted.
specific_skill_section.first-content: Specific industries (14 fields Nursing care / Building cleaning / Shape material industry / Industrial machinery manufacturing industry / Electrical and electronic information related industries / Construction / Shipbuilding / Marine industry / Automobile maintenance / Aviation / Accommodation / Agriculture / Fishing / Food / food manufacturing Business / restaurant business
specific_skill_section.second-content: * Specific Skill No. 2 only for construction, shipbuilding and marine industries (as of April 2019)

one.title: Shupan News
one.subtitle: You can browse news related to specific skills.

one.title: Specializing in specific skills personnel
one.description-one: With the revision of the law in April 2019, a specific skill visa has been newly established, and the direction of recruitment strategies for domestic companies is about to change significantly.
one.description-two: On this site, we have built a human resources bank specialized in specific skills and create matching with human resources from around the world.

second.title: Complete performance reward type
second.description-one: Our services are operated on a full performance compensation basis. You can use it with low risk even for the first time, and you can minimize the cost burden of recruiting.
second.description-two: Foreigners: There are no costs associated with using the services on this site, such as member registration and database usage fees.
second.description-three: Foreigners: There are no costs associated with using the services on this site, such as member registration and database usage fees.
second.description-four: Companies: Company registration, recruitment posting, database usage fee is free. A performance fee is paid for each person hired. The performance reward will be 20% of the annual total salary plan (including various benefits).
second.description-box: * Annual salary plan = monthly salary x 12 months + postal allowance, family allowance, housing allowance, and other allowances
second.description-five: Registration support organization: Registration of support organization, posting of recruitment, database usage fee is free. A system usage fee of 29,800 yen (tax included) per person will be charged for each job placement contract to a recruiting company.

third.title: Two-way communication
third.description-one: The site has a message function and a web interview function (the web interview function uses BizMee of grabss Co., Ltd.). Direct communication is possible between them.

contact_section.title: Contact Us
contact_section.title-description: Fill in the necessary information and press the confirmation button. Click here for Privacy Policy
